metadata.Description: Organizations that provide financial support and expertise for development projects in multiple countries.

multilateral development banks.Description: Multilateral development banks implement energy efficiency policies to promote sustainable energy practices.
Multilateral development banks provide funding for renewable energy projects to support the transition to clean energy sources.
Multilateral development banks focus on climate change mitigation efforts by supporting sustainable energy initiatives.
Multilateral development banks are involved in the Partnership for Sustainable Energy to promote collaboration in the sustainable energy sector.
Multilateral development banks partner with private sector companies to leverage their expertise and resources for sustainable energy projects.
Multilateral development banks contribute to improving access to clean energy by supporting projects in underserved areas.
Multilateral development banks monitor the progress of energy efficiency targets to ensure effective implementation of sustainable energy policies.
Multilateral development banks set targets for increasing renewable energy generation to promote a shift towards clean and sustainable energy sources.
Multilateral development banks address energy poverty by supporting initiatives that provide access to affordable and reliable energy services.
